item.title: The Epic Life by The Sound Off Season 2
item.description:
The Epic Life by The Sound Off Season 2

Exclusive interview with former fire fighter and professional lacrosse player turned entrepreneur Darryl MacDonald. Darryl founded life mentorship program 'The Epic Life Academy'. New Music from Garth Adam, Nile Groove and Ray William Roldan.

The Sound Off

Hit us up on Facebook

item.title: Backstage Shoegazing by The Sound Off Season 2
item.description:
Backstage Shoegazing by The Sound Off Season 2

The Sound Off this week discusses backstage demands and routines. We shed light on Shoegaze rock with new music from The Veldt, Blood Hounds On My Trail and Ummagma.

item.title: #1: Lack of Presence
item.description:
#1: Lack of Presence

Social media is a crucial tool all artists and bands need to take advantage of. It is very simple to post about a recent single or new video release time and time again. There are some important facts you must consider to avoid wasting your time and start getting the most out of your social media platforms.

item.title: Shotify Spotify by The Sound Off
item.description:
Shotify Spotify by The Sound Off

The Sound Off with Kev and Jay review the Spotify app and talk about the intrusiveness of advertising. We discover new British Rock this week courtesy of Blue Soap Music. New Music from Mellor and Tony Steele.

item.title: Hip Hop Is Not Dead by The Sound Off
item.description:
Hip Hop Is Not Dead by The Sound Off

The Sound Off with Kev and Jay discuss Gene Simmons recent remarks about the death of hip hop and they talk about the biggest mistake artists make on social media. New Music this week by MoSS and Rich McMichael.

Wayhome '16 Preview by The Sound Off

The Sound Off's preview of the upcoming Wayhome festival 2016.
